Description: 1960s Silvertone 1457 Up for sale is a cool and fairly clean 1960s era Silvertone 1457 electric guitar in its original red-burst finish. Typically the 1457 model came with an amplifier built into the original case and although this example does have its original case the amp has been removed. This model features a full-scale length neck, dual lipstick pickups and a seriously cool vibe. Aside from the missing amp in the original case and the tuners being replaced this one is all original. Pro setup in-house and comes complete with its original hard case. Details Year: 1960s.Model: 1457Serial: N/A.Finish: Red Burst.Case: Original hardshell case.Weight: 6lbs. 4oz.Condition: Very good condition less surface and play wear.Modifications: Tuners replaced, case amp removed.Comments: Cool and clean '60s Silvertone 1457 in its original red burst finish!
